column1: 254411,Nurse Practitioner,,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column7: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column9: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health

column15: Communicate detailed medical information to patients or family members
column19: Advise patients of health conditions or treatments
column21: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column23: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column25: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column29: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column31: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column37: Administer health care or medical treatments
column41: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column43: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column45: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column49: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column53: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
